Package org.magelan.drawing.markup

Interface Summary
MarkupViewer The default markup drawing viewer implementation.
SelectionDecorator Defines means to decorate selected drawing elements.
SelectionListener Selection Listener Interface
 

Class Summary
DefaultMarkupViewer The default markup drawing viewer implementation.
DefaultSelectionDecorator Decorates selected elements by painting their outline with a different stroke.
HighlightDecorator Decorates selected elements by repainting their outline with a stroke 2 units thick and applying transparent fill to their interior.
SelectionEvent Selection Event is invoked when selection is changed
